: : Kup : :

Kup: I'm not sure myself, Yggdrasil.

Kup turns to Quet.

Kup: I just need to discuss your intentions at the Ark. I cant allow the Ark to be indangered. I was going to trust Maxima with it, and fight Scourge, but you took things over from him.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Quet:

"I have the plesure to chat with Kup??? isn't?"said cheerfully the 
male "Ok,I'll leave the base for chat... just don't let that your 
pal shoot me... 'cause I don't like a Time-mess"

Quet left the base and steped out. He typed soem buttons and base's 
doors closed.

"I'm here"said the young bot "What do you wish??"
